content.detailedDescription:
Report taken by dispatch while witness was on phone....Steve cox, mufon dispatch

went and stayed at a ranch owned by robert cross. house didnt look like something that should be in that area, looked like somrthing that should be on the coast on a beach, house had outside catwalks..

while staying in the house it was very windy, while he was laying down he noticed he couldnt hear the wind blowing anymore so he desided to go out and call the coyotes..

when he walked down stair he noticed a ball of sparkling light get up from the couch, float by him, through a double glass slideing door  and rise up to the sky.
content.summary: Ball of sparkling light

content.detailedDescription:
(i have several photographs of this object, but hesitate to send them at this time)
the day after christmas, i got up in the morning around 9:15am, had breakfast, puttered around my 9th floor apartment getting ready to go out for a while.
at around 10:00am i gazed out my living room window - looking west, scanning the horizon as i frequently do, since there is alot of industry with smoke stacks that i informally monitor for excessive pollution. 
i saw that there wasn't too much to be concerned about that morning, however, i noticed a very small "cloud" which stood out, not far above the horizon. i watched this for a while as it moved slowly to the right (southwest). i picked up a small, cheap set of binocluars to get a better look (as my eyesight is not the greatest for distances).What struck me was that it did not dissipate or change like most small clouds do. 

will continue later...There is much more to report..
content.summary: 1st impression: small cloud, by itself, moving slowly above/along horizon, not dissipating; 5 minutes later, same shape, changed direction

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
What i am about to describe is the truth. the precursor to the ufo event began in june 2007 at 9:23 pm. i was living in the city with my mom and was on the computer. a message popped up from my instant messenger with the words, "agent...[censored]" and "blackoperations", stating that someone would like to add me. i stared at it for a minute and felt amazed. thinking to myself, "could it be someone 'in the know' who would like to talk to me? what is 'black operations'?". i eagerly accepted the add request and opened a conversation window. the avatar displayed an emblem of, "u.S. department of defense" with a black background. i said, "hello, agent...[censored]?" the mysterious person replied and a conversation began. the "agent" told me about how i'm "key" to an "event" in the "future" along with a few "others". than the agent elaborated a bit about a person from the year 2036 by the name of, "[censored]" (not "john titor") and that this person was part of a special operations unit with "c204" equipment the team uses. the agent first advised me to walk away from this time traveler because, i'd understand when the time comes. later the agent asked if i met the traveler. i have not to this day. being so confused and amazed at the same time, i wanted to ask a lot of questions and was told that is all the agent was able to say. so i knew a little about the titor story and seeked others for information. a few days later after divulging what had happened, to "titor" experts, the agent contacted me and said i couldn't be trusted. there was another. i felt i had lost an opportunity to be part of a "top secret" time travel agenda because, after running a quick search on the agents name, there appeared to be a real world person. but was i being deceived or cleverly entangled with fact and fiction?

i do not remember when i had sleep paralysis before or after june. but i do remember that i had to make a promise to myself to remember that what i had seen in my dreams was before finding an article on an alien abduction case from kansas of an artists sketch of proportional similarities. it was a grey entity with deep eyes and a vibrant garment on a dark and desolate landscape. i kept reminding myself that it was important to know that the entity was seen before i found a similar image. that it was somehow a credible description. but after finding the alien abduction story i couldn't read anything more about it because, "earthfiles" website had a subscription fee. there's more about these dreams but moving on...

several months later, my mom and i had moved out of the city to my grandparents in a small community due to a bed bug infestation. it was winter. my first ufo sighting appeared january 18th 2008 at around 11:00 pm. i was watching t.V. and a red shimmering light reflected off the walls. i got up to the window and looked to see what it was. about a kilometer away, just across from the road leading into the small community, over the prairie fields, was a large hovering fireball moving north. it was flying low and looked as though it was melting light. i guess it was the way the light of the object moved or appeared... my mom was fortunately with me and witnessed the ufo. i wanted to take a picture of it but i intuitively calculated the insufficient time there was to get a camera. it would be gone. i pondered the idea of running out to it but felt it was not wise, especially for a first ufo sighting. it lasted in my view for a few minutes before dissapearing behind the row of houses.

sometime around the 18 or 19th one night on my way into the city, white sparks dashed straight down toward the ditch. it evaporated before hitting the ground. now in the city, i looked to my left drivers windows to the intersection a block away and another stream of sparks fell down and evaporated just above the street lights. later on my way out of the city, on a service road by some crop fields, another stream fell within close proximity and view. i signaled the lite traffic to see if others from behind saw it. i don't remember if any cars signaled while passing by... i turned around and went to see if there was any debris or fragments but couldn't find anything.

june 2008 at around 2:00 am, i was on the computer... an add request popped up in my new email and instant messenger. it was from the mysterious agent. i accepted it and a message soon after popped up, "your beind watched. i have left my organisation and i just want to warn you to be careful.". soon after, a white cargo van came by and i could almost see someone in it because, the interior light was on. now shocked and scared, i got away from the window and couldn't move. the van drove around a few times, beaming a bright light at the window. no one was up to see what was happening. i heard a door slam from the van and it eventually left. i awakened my grandparents and they didn't take it seriously.

following that day, as the days turned into weeks, months, i found myself attached to the night sky because, star-like objects kept coming and going. eventually... one night, a star-like 'spherical' object flew very close to me as it went over from above my grandparents...  at about 50 feet... it was no plane... it was about a meter in diamter. it was a ball of white light... an orb... than it started to illuminate into a bright gold color for awhile and returned to its 'natural' state of a star-like white orb. i felt at peace at the time because it was so quiet and it looked friendly somehow...

i lost track of time for awhile and fell into depression. it was because of what was happening, continuously... being confused and left without any support or answeres. alone and unable to organize anyone or anything to obtain evidence or eye witnesses. every night these star-like objects would than immedietely "flash" as soon as i stepped outside on some random time and night. it was time synchronized... not only were these ufos responding to my presense outside but whenever i look at the time, it comes up with 11:11, 22:22, 3:33, etc...

i have got videos of digital and high definition recordings of these ufos. 

in 2009 before moving back into the city, i had a very close encounter with a ufo passing over me and it was a blue orb....

at my new place one night, a star-like ufo came over. these ufos continue to follow and be synchronized with my presense. but until recently, i don't bother to seek them out... they are there.

it has also come to my attention that the mysterious organization has made contact with neighbors in that small community.

the question remains, what were the neighbors told?
do they know about the ufo activity? the truth of ufo phenomena?

ufo footage available upon request...

thank you for hearing me out.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Chevron,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Covert organization contacts, informs of me of an impending event and later finds my location. followed by year round, annual ufo encounters from 2008 to 2009.

content.detailedDescription: This image was taken with my videocamera in the city of n.Y. queens with orientation to manhattan the distance and latitude i think it was in the vicinity of zone zero in lower manhattan so we could see the size that is nothing compared to some common helicopters flying in the area, sizes and colors are incredible, moving slowly, i could record up to be covered by the roof of this house.
content.summary: Ufo in new york

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i had driven up to the church in the sierra vista mlountains to watch the sun set, we left at arount 5 to the mountains, we arrived and spent time there and after the sun set we sat on a bench right outside the church, the church sits half way up this small mountain, we were over looking the city of sierra vista, at around six thirty or seven, i can't recall the exact time, we both were looking up at the stars when we noticed the sky on the left getting darker to where it blocked off the stars, this object was massive in size and it hovered over us, my girlfriend was scared when she saw this and i was nervous, the object made a noise like a propane stove burning would make when you lit it, the object moved at a slow pase like it was just floating through the air, it moved passed us and as it did it muted all noise from the traffic on the highway below the mountain and all the crickets were also silent, it was quiet except for the noise coming from the object, the object was a large traingle shape with 3 lights on the tips and lights on the bottom, my girlfriend said she also noticed other lights along it which i did not, the object headed northeast and as it passed over us a smaller light detached it self from it and headed north towards the town of sierra vista, we watched both objects and watched them go into the distance, the smaller object then stopped at what it seemed to be the middle of the town and released a bright red strobe like sphere that went into the town and dissapeared, i called my sister, who lives in sierra vista also, right after this happened to see if she had seen anything in town or in the sky, she had not, a few minutes after this two jets flew out of fort huachuca in the direction of the larger object, i had my cell phone with me and it has a camera, i did not take video or pics of this, i did not think of that at the time, i have never seen anything like this before and even though i have always had an interest in the subject, this is the first time i have experienced something like this to where i have a hard time believing it myself, i am just glad my girlfriend witnessed it with me. i had told every one i met of this event and most have laughed and i wanted to come fort only because i want to learn more and i want others to also share their experiences, thank you.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object came from behind mountain and passed over head, close view of object

content.detailedDescription:
We were in our yard on lahontan dam rd in fallon nv late july-or early aug.
the sky was dark and clear. at any given time of day or night one can lookout in the sky and see 3 fallon air station jets/planes in the air over the fallon, silver springs, lake lahontan areas.  they have red and white lights.
that night i saw come over the mountains direcly behind our property, a huge glowing white craft flying parallel to the horizon rather than upward.  i could see 3 navy planes rounding up to try to follow it but they were not fast enough and as the large craft kept going, it vanished but without actually flying too far away for me to see, it just plain vanished.  this craft moved so fast it had a huge long "trail". the craft dwarfed the navy planes. like 3 mosquitoes chasing a large watermelon, so to speak.
it was amazing to witness such a sight.
of course the navy planes were still visible long after the craft disappeared.
i was too awestruck for those few seconds to tell my husband to turn around and look--and then it was over.
content.summary: Huge brightly illuminated disc being followed by 3 fallon nv naval air station fighter jets which then vanished without moving out of visible sight, but the navy planes were still clearly visible

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out the back of my house having a ciggarrette as usual. it was completely dark and i was looking to the north. i was looking into the sky for only about 20sec. and a object that looked small, rectangular in shape with a dim, flourescent green light all over it. at first instinct, i was startled from this object comming into my perrifrial vision. but i then immediatly figured it for a shooting star. and then instantly it confused me because i could not tell if this object was actually far out enough into space that it could be a shooting star. or if this object was within the distance of a high flying bird or airplane. it came from the east and headed southwest, around the corner of my house. it moved fairly fast and its speed and movement reminded me of a low flying bird. i was confused on what it could be and i looked in its direction for about 15 minutes afterward without another sight.
content.summary: I was looking north and a small, rectangular, object that looked a dim florescent green, just scooted across the sky. i could not tell if it was close or far from me.

content.detailedDescription: I drive truck from slc ut. to carlin nv. nights going west on i-80 just about before dark about 25 miles from wendover i seen red lights come on and off. not moving when on but moved when on again. thay were south of wendover by blue lake or more south. they seemed quite large becouse of the distance they seemed to be. the event was for at least a min. also to the east there was somthing flighing in the cloud like a big plane i only seen it for abot 2 seconds. like it didnt want go out of the cloud it aslso was much lower in the sky than the lights.   about week and 1/2 later i saw simular lights but were orange. they were moving west and downward.  they seemed like varybig flares that only lastes 2 to 3 sec. then went a distance then lit up again but not moving when lit. i noticed the lighs out my left window. i though it was army flares but i have never seen any that ackted like these. im allwas looking out i see metores most nighs and allwas looking for something i cant exsplane.
content.summary: Light like a road flare but quite large. multiple lights on and off but in different locations. on for about 3 sec. first night i seen them they were red about week or so later similar lights but orangeish-red.

content.detailedDescription: My wife is a sensitive and communicates with orb engergies in our back yard that appears to be a vortex for the past ten years.  she was taking morning flash shots with our camera at about 5:30 am.  she did not notice the craft when she took the pic.  it was a few days later when i had just downloaded the pics to my computer and was reviewing the orbs she had caught and this picture image hit me like a brick.  i could not comprehend it at first and finally with her viewing assistance we decided she had caught some craft in flight just above our tree line at our fence row.  it is amazingly clear and when it is enlarged you can make out a canopy and the craft appears to be turning showing its underside and aerodynamics.  this has been on coast, on kevin's arizona show and interviewed my wife for two hours.  no one can explain what she caught but the incredible energies continue to be here along with all kinds of mists and little light angels all night long.  we have hundreds of such photos stored.  but never another like this craft.  you are welcome to take a quess.  we would take a polygraph to show this is not a doctored photo or one made up on photoshop.  view for yourself.  more info is available upon request.
content.summary: My wife caught this craft while taking pictures of our morning orbs.

content.detailedDescription: As i walked out my front door (looking to the north east) i noticed two very bright goldish lights behind a tree that is two blocks over.  they were very bright and i never recalled seeing them before.  as i walked on side of my house i kept thinking about what it could be.  i was thinking maybe it is from the local playground, but i realized that the playground is about 3 blocks to the right.  i walked back to the front of my house by the door and kept looking at them.  they were very bright so i was thinking they looked like planets but they were too low in the horizon.  i kept staring at them trying to make them out.  then,  i could tell one was larger than the other.  the larger light started slowly moving up.  at first it was so slow it was like it wasn't moving.  i live near the airport so i was thinking it could be a plane or helicopter but it wasn't moving like one.  it was moving very slowly.  as it started moving closer to me i could see it more clearly coming over the house across the street.  i was totally fixated on it.  it was like a circle with three large lights in the center and an outer edge of a few lights but a tranclucent looking circle edge extended past the lights.  the lights now looked more off white in color.  i did not know what i was seeing.  i noticed the smaller one started to move as well taking the same path as the first one.  i ran inside to get my camera, and my cousin came out of the house with me.  by this time, the large one was gone.  i pointed out the smaller one and he could see it clearly.  it was moving more slowly than the first one.  i tried to turn my camera on but my battery shut it off right away.  i looked around for the large one but could not see but i did notice a red light moving oddly way up in the air.  it was too small to make out.  i am not sure about that one. the second object was now almost directly overhead moving to the west just like the larger one.  my cousin tried to record it with his phone but we could not get the image to record.  it was also shaped like the first but with only a single light in the center.  it was about half the size of the first one.  after it flew overhead, we could no longer see it because is started moving faster. neither object made a sound at all.  i am used to hearing planes and see them on a daily basis.  this was not on the normal flight path and made no noise at all. i know it was not a plane or helicopter.  it was moving like it was traveling more north west towards the lake after it passed my house away from the airport (it took like a curved path).  i drew pictures but have not scanned them yet to upload.  the large one was about the size of a large airplane and the small one half that size.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 2 circle shaped objects - one large, one small close up - directly overhead was a small object that could not be made out clearly

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and her husband had come down to charleston, sc, to visit with his family but the girlfriend and i wanted to watch the mars-rise from the beach on sullivan's island since hearing that this was the closest mars would be to earth for a long time.  mars rose up out of the water and that was very nice.  my friend called her husband on her cell and i got distracted, playing with the sand.  i looked up into the sky to check on mars again (11 o'clock position, a little above the horizon) and saw, at about the 1 o'clock position and somewhat higher in the sky, a glowing ball of light.  it started off white and then faded to yellow then orange and, like a dimmer switch, it faded to black.  i looked at my friend who was still talking to her husband and she, who apparently had been watching this phenomenon already, flashed out the palm of one hand as if to say, "what gives?"  she finally got off the phone and we watched a whole series of these lights pop on like when you snap on a light at home and the lights would start as a bright white and then dim to yellow, orange, dark orange then they would go out.  we discussed what the lights could be:  flares?  no, flares would have tails from their point of launch and these had no tails.  flares would also tend to drop--these didn't--and i would presume their light would last longer than the 5-10 seconds these lights lasted.  we could not come up with an explanation.

sometimes two lights would appear simultaneously, or almost, and would be relatively close together.  the activity of the lights moved more towards the 12 o'clock position and some remained at the 1 o'clock position and always about two hand-breadths above the horizon.  we saw that there were others who were watching the lights from the isle of palms beach across the access to the inland waterway.  sometimes if two lights appeared, they would do a little "dance."  they would like joggle around a little but not touch each other.  the entire show of lights snapping on and dimming went on for a good 15 minutes.  finally, two lights appeared and then the two split to make four lights and these four did a little dance.  this was at the 11 o'clock position.

then, from over my left shoulder, two jets flying close together and high in the night sky, zoomed directly towards the part of the sky where the four dancing lights had just been.  they were too fast to be private jets and it would be unlikely anyway that two private jets would be flying close together.  i speculated at that time that the jets had likely come from the air force base in columbia, sc, about 120 miles to the west, the direction from they were coming.  the light show ceased immediately upon the arrival of the jets.  we hung around for a while to see if the lights would return and they did not.  we did not see the jets come back, either.

as far as my feelings, it was just kind of a head-scratcher, you know?  i did not feel like anything was trying to communicate with me or anything like that; i was fairly emotion-less, yet interested.  neither of us were spazzing out or freaking out; we were like, "hmmm.  how about that?"  naturally, neither of us had a camera.
content.summary: Glowing balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure on the exact date or time, it's been a few years since i saw this. i didn't know that mufon existed for me to report the sighting to until i found out tonight.

my sighting:

i'm a 30 year old white male. i work as a network administrator for a plywood company in darlington, sc. 

my gf had adopted a yellow lab for me as a new-home gift to help celebrate our new home in lamar, sc. i am originally from maine and moved down here about 3.5 years ago. (side note...Seen many unknown objects in the sky through-out my 16 years living up in northern maine, about 15 miles south of houlton on i-95 in merrill, maine...Too many sighting up in the sky to account for). anyways...Being familiar with seeing objects in the sky, i am always looking 'up' during the nighttime if i am ever out side.

one night some time in august of 2007, not sure on the exact date, i had taken my puppy outside to go pee. the time was between 10pm to 10:15pm. the sky was somewhat clear, but with a few clouds here and there. 

i had looked up in the sky, towards the east. i saw 1 bright orange orb at about 45 degrees south of me. the light was completely stationary. as i was looking at it, i noticed another bright orange orb...It had appeared to the right of the 1st orb, but back a ways from the other. as i was watching the orbs, i noticed they were moving but very very slowly. i stood watchign them for awhile, maybe 5 minutes, and i noticed they were fading out. i then lost visual of both orbs. about a couple minutes had passed and i noticed not 2, but now 3 orbs appeared way closer to me. the distance they traveled would have been equivalent to about 5 miles or so. they were now at about a 80 degree angle to me now. 

i was blown away at the distance they traveled in such a short time, again only about 2 minutes, as the 2 objects i had seen prior were going very very slow before.

i continued to observe the 3 bright orange orbs for another couple minutes and then all 3 of the orbs disappeared by fading out 1 at a time. 

i have never seen anything like this before, or since. i have been living here for about 3 and a half years now.

i did some research about a year ago, and around the same time frame in august of 2007, people had spotted similar bright orange orbs off the coast of myrtle beach. well, myrtle beach is directly east of my house. the same direction that i had seen my 3 bright orange orbs. 

coincidence??
content.summary: 3 bright orange orbs spotted in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cigar shape object with a purple hue too it, non-blinking lights!

i was dropping a friend off from fishing one summer night about 8:30pm, when i started to pull away my friend starts yelling at me to look up, he's jumping up and down, up and down! i jump out saying, what's the problem!! he's saying look!! look!!  it was a ufo! 

it was a cigar shape object that was pretty dame long. i'm guessing it was at a altitude of about 5000 feet, it could of been higher but i'm gonna say 5000 ft! the freaky thing about this was, you couldn't see both ends of this ufo at one time that's how long it was, it did have a purple hue to it with no noise that i could hear but then again it was pretty high up. the speed of this thing was slow but eventually it faded away and then it was gone.. after it was all over with all i could do was stand there with a dumbfounded look on my face, starring, same thing with friend!
content.summary: Drop a friend off from fishing, started to pull away when he starts yelling at me to look up.

content.detailedDescription: On december 17, 2009, my sister and i spoke with a mufon field investigator about our december 9 report file, mainly based on strange orange orbs we had sighted several times over past couple months.  about an hour after getting on the phone with the investigator, appr. 8:45pm, we heard what sounded like a helicopter nearby, so we went on the front porch and looked to see the strangest craft we have seen out of all of our sightings.  it appeared to be even lower than a skyscraper, and it was definitely within a mile from where we standing.  there were two large turquoise lights side-by-side, and smaller red lights that alternated steady blinking at the front and back.  all the lights appeared to be on the same plane, meaning they all were level.  it moved slowly, and it was heading south to north.  it was dark so we couldn't make out a shape, just the lights.  ever since, we haven't seen any other phenomenon, including the orange orbs, which is very strange because we were seeing the orbs almost every night.  we have looked online and can find nothing about turquoise lights like these on typical aircraft, or even ufos.  we absolutely want help explaining this because now we know for sure that this is something else.
content.summary: Low-flying craft with two side-by-side large turquoise lights and smaller blinking (alternating) red lights at front and back.

content.detailedDescription:
it was christmas night 2009 and i was on my front patio looking through my new telescope at the night sky. the street in front of our house runs straight into the beach, so i have a 100% view directly down the street. anyway, i was looking around and i happened to look toward the beach. i saw an orange light which i thought was a plane making a slow decent, but it took a really long time to get near the shore and it had no blinking lights. 
 once it got between my house and santa catalina island, it made a banking turn and discharged 3 burning things, which all burned the entire way down to the ocean. when it turned, i happened to catch the slightest glimpse of it. it was silver like brushed aluminum, not shiny. it looked like a rounded, silver stealth bomber, or like the number 3. the orange glow was heat coming off of it. once the 3 items had been discharged, it took about 3 seconds for the craft to vanish towards the port of los angeles/long beach. it was directly over the scattered off-shore oil-rig field. someone or some surveillance camera had to have seen it.
 earlier this year in january 2009 i had reported a similar sighting just south of here, in newport beach. in that case the craft was sitting still and emitting "lots" of burning debris in a similar fashion.
 i cannot believe that being this close to the beach, and so close to so many beach communities, that no one else saw either one of these incidents.
 thank you.
content.summary: A silver, rounded "stealth bomber-like" craft. boomerang with an additional point in the middle, like yhe number 3.

content.detailedDescription:
Going eastbound, i noticed out left had window a grey object circular going toward moffet field sfo line.  the bottom of the object had a textured surface similar to egg crate (it had many smaller inverse domes going around the circular grey shape).  i found it facinating that i was watching this thing go over in broad daylight approx. 1,000-2,000 ft. off the ground going over a major highway.  it was high enough up to be the same altitude as incoming 747 headed toward sfo on approach but had no wings that i could tell, though it was going the same speed of an incoming airliner.  it 'floated' past and i was so astonished, i forgot to pull out the cellphone and grab a pic, plus trying to concentrate driving in morning traffic. 

when first noticed the object, my immididate reaction was this was extraterrestial. i know airplanes and this wasnt one.

after sighting i thought i must have just somehow seen something either astonishing or was plain mistaken somehow. i didnt think anyone would believe me if i did report it anyway.

i lost site of the object behind trees as the freeway dipped in elevation by a golf course.
content.summary: Traveling 237 eastbound past moffett field exit a cirular grey object  overhead

content.detailedDescription: My dogs awaken me first at 4:30am on sunday 12/28/09.  i let them outside and they came back in. i went back to bed 5 mins. later. my one dog awaken me  again at 5:45am. as i was getting out of bed i glanced out the bedroom window and saw a bright red light in the sky. i walked over to the window and opened it to get a clearer view and to listen for a sound. in doing so i heard a very low hum that went from high to low. that morning you could hear a pin drop. living in the woods is extremely quite during the winter and sunday morning 12/27/09 was a cold crisp, no clouds, star lit sky no wind morning. it was completely still. the object was actually just above the tops of the trees and about a 1/2 football field away. it was quite larger. it was hard to define the actually shape and size. when i first spotted it there what appears to be 3 prongs or legs hanging down from it covered in red, blue green, yellow - amber lights. i awaken my friend to come and take a look. as he was watching this object i was trying to find my i phone to no avail. i flickered the outside lights on and off. he stated as i did that the white light underneath the object changed to a blue green. the object appeared to be square to him with lights at each corner and a light in the middle. he stated that middle light shot a beam down but it didn't reach the ground when i was flickering the outside lights on and off. i quickly got dressed and jump in my car to follow it since it moving very slowly. it actually look as if it was gliding more so than being propelled. as i got to a clearing at the end of the road the object had already appeared to be about 2 miles away on the other side of the hill side. i turned around and went back home. as i got out of the car another object flew directly over my house heading in the same path as the previous object. i was able to see that it had a red light on each end of the span and a white light in the center. this object was about 2000' feet up it was larger. i listened for a sound and determine it was a plane.  a plane has never flown directly over my house especially at the low of a altitude.
content.summary: Ufo , was not a plane or ballon or helicopter that i'm sure of...

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from evening college course which ended at 9pm. traveling east on west oak ridge road where oak ridge crosses florida turnpike. because i was going up the approach of the bridge, i had a better than average view of the eastern sky.
what i saw was a string of multicolored lights traveling across the sky from se to nw. they were not brilliant lights. more like an led behind a frosted lens. i pulled to the roadside after passing over the bridge and got out to get a better look. the lights were by this time directly overhead. they were absolutely noiseless. the object had a cylindrical body but did not have a sharp outline. the outside edges appeared to be slightly blurred or fuzzy as might be observed if the object were behind frosted glass. they eventually disappeared to the nw. duration of event: 3-4 minutes. observation: west oak ridge road is a busy four lane road. it was busy for the entire duration of this event yet no one seemed to notice it. not surprising as most drivers will be looking at the road ahead and not up into the night sky. i have never reported this sighting as i didn't expect anyone to take it seriously. after seeing the picture of the same ufo on the coast-to-coast website i was prompted to submit this report as evidence to support the picture.
content.summary: String of lights 100m+ long 300-500m altitude.Speed <50knots, silent on course 340 degrees

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i wanted to investigate the paulding lights mystery. so the morning of march 1, 2009, after i had gotten off work, we took an northwest airline flight from minneapolis, minnesota to iron mountain, michigan. we landed about 4:30pm and i think we left iron mountain's airport, called ford airfield, about 5:30pm. we rented a car and drove to paulding.  it was about +2 above zero when we left the airport. we drove from iron mountain mi and paulding mi via state road 2 to watersmeet then state road 45 to paulding. we made one stop for coffee (but i would have to go back and re-due the route to remember which gas station we stopped at). the sun was starting to set low and i told my son that he should do an intro to our video explaining what and where we where going to investigate. as he turned on the camera, the camera filmed something in the back seat of our car, however, we never had time to review the film until three months later. i have asked the institute on the environment at the university of minnesota to see if someone there might have an idea on what this might be. i also posted the video on youtube to see if anyone else might of filmed or seen the samething. youtube post: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=8yvobed6qgi

here are your following points:

1. we were driving to pauling michigan from iron mountian airport.
2. reviewing the film we took looking for the paulding lights.
3. dimensional person.
4. we did not noticed anything while we where driving. not until i reviewed the film 3 months later did we see the thing in the back seat.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. normal
6. how did you lose sight of the object? only the camera saw it.

we were using a jvc compact camcorder model gr-axm17u, it uses vhs-c tapes. i really would like someone to take a real good look at this film. 

sincerly,

sfc luis j. soria (ret)
content.summary: We filmed something in the back seat of our rental car.

content.detailedDescription:
"narrative below was submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness."

witness was in car driving, when she noticed she was running out of gas, so she parked the car. it was dark out and then she noticed over her shoulder a big white light not moving. she also noticed tow smaller red lights that were connected to the white light, blinking. she could see airplanes in the distance, but could hear no sound from this object. it continued to hover, then it started going up and down. the white light was going on and off, then it started to move. telepathically, she asked to see the color green and she said she then saw a green light appear. she drove home and went into her bathroom and called her boyfriend and told him about the event.
the next day, she saw an object that looked like a white balloon, but knew it wasn't a balloon because of the way it moved in a horse-shoe pattern. the object then turned a silver color. she said she received a telepathic communication that softly said, "you forgot to tell him about the white light." later, she called her boyfriend and asked his if she told him about the white light, and he responded that he didn't think she mentioned anything about a white light.
content.summary: Big white light hovering with two smaller red lights attached to it.

content.detailedDescription: I run a paper route in northern oswego county, my  boundry is lake ontario. i was heading east from the lake and noticed some very bright amber lights to my left up over a hill that was there, i didn't pay that much attention to it at first because it is a very rural area and i thought it was someone building a camp or something and had some really good lighting.  i remember it was a very cloudy night after a rain with a really low cloud ceiling. i drove about a mile and a half and the lights started to go up in the sky.  needless to say i stopped my car and just watched, there were six lights in a rounded line really bright amber then they started moving all over the place. at first i thought it was one big thing and then i realized it was many things making many shapes in the sky. i then got a cold chill and headed for town because i got scared. i almost headed for home because i thought it was some kind of invasion but then the lights went back into it's original shape and took off for the sky way up high, because until then they were really low to the ground, probably not more than a few hundred feet. i decided to finish my route and looked up one more time to see this whatever it was being chased by some really fast jets. there was no sound.  i listened to the news for a few days after that and i did here one report from a couple down in mexico point new york, which is just a few miles from were i was. some of the other carriers saw it but we never tol anyone else because they all roll there eyes at you. so thats my story there are other things i have seen around that lake but people think im nuts so i keep it to myself.
content.summary: 3 nights before pheonix lights in upstate new york

content.detailedDescription:
"narrative below was submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness."

during the summer of 1988, either july or august, this single witness was driving her car heading east on highway 25a. it was approximately 7- 7:30 pm but it was still light out. stopped at a red light, she observed a huge oval-shaped craft over the four lane highway, skimming over the top of the trees, heading north. the craft had windows in which she could see someone inside. the craft was as big as a football field. she could hear a sound like a motor that went boom-boom-boom. she felt the craft was in trouble. she saw this for about 10 minutes. she said she called the police and the newspaper, but no one called her back.
content.summary: Huge craft seen skimming trees with someone inside.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 4am i was a few blocks east of the las vegas strip on a security guard site. i was looking at the top dead center of the sky in hopes of seeing both meteors from the leonid showers and also watching for satelites passing over [they do that an hr before dawn]

i saw a very bright meteor pass from s/e to n/w near the top of the sky but at the same time, unrelated to the meteor, i noticed an egg or football shaped object float from north to south. it was metallic and gold colored. i observed the strip casino lights reflecting off the bottom as it moved further south. i estimate it's size to be 3x that of an airliner and flying at about the same height but a faster speed. i watched very intently as i knew when it got to the south part of town there would be no more bright ground lights to illuminate it. there were no lights coming from the object and it was silent.

i'm guessing it was a secret usaf vehicle being tested from area whatever down to the edwards afb. later on that morning i rememberd seeing a photo posted on the old art bell ufo pages of the "las vegas ufo" the poster had an aol address is all i remember. the photo was exactly what i saw but my sighting was of the object traveling not like a football end to end but sideways. the "las vegas ufo" photo was posted at around 97' and at the time i thought it was a fraud and was actually the sanyo blimp. but on the night i mentioned i saw it for real. that was my one and only ufo sighting in my entire life, 65 yrs at this writing.
content.summary: Las vegas ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Missing 1 whole day, no body marks no cuts, saw craft with 7x50 binoculars no light on the outside but very bright white light on the inside.

report taken by dispatch..Steve cox, mufon dispatch
content.summary: Lost time

content.detailedDescription:
On friday evening at the walnut creek headquarters of the k-4 cattleranch in yavapai county arizona..Approximately 74 miles outside of prescott arizona..At the base of indian hill..While working on cattle trailer and work truck in maintenance barn...I was called outside by three ranch hands and their families at about 9:00 pm in the evening on july 21st. 1985 -to look at object moving at snails pace over top of main house from the east.
that was over one hundred yards long triangle shaped with three huge bright blue lights on the bottom...With smaller port hole like lights all the way around object.  the object made no actual noise...And came to standstill right over main ranch house.  the cattle and horses became very quiet..Bunching up in corals and fields..As far from it as they could get.
plus, the herd dogs-whom normally alert by barking-made tracks to hay barn and buried themselves in the huge stack of hay bails.  i went to my home and got my wife and our daughter to see this weird thing...While i gathered my family i retrieved my rifle and pistol..Along with my fellow ranch hands..And their familes...We stood there looking at this thing...My wife took pictures with our camera..While others snaped photo's too!

then without exception we found ourselves in our homes..Waking up (what we thought was the next morning)...But, it wasn't...(it was three days later)-our boss (the owner) paid us out tack and wages thinking it one date.  when we went to town...We discovered it was not the day we thought.  as we get paid regurly on a certain date and by approximately from 600.Oo to $800.00 dollars of groceries..All at one time...The local store keeps cash on hand to cash our checks (as by the time we get there the banks are closed.)  having to travel over rough mountain roads to end of pavement (as we refered to it)..About 44 miles over rough wash boarded...Pot holed..Dirt roads..Until you hit asphalt outside of prescott.

the store employee's had expected us two days prior..Showed us that days newspaper...(as we just starred at each other in dis-belief)...But, we weren't alone...Walnut creek station has four ranch headquarters located in tiny valley and one forest service fire jump fire-fighter's facility there.  at the base of indian hill surrounded by enscarpment like volcanic mesa's.  the store employee or night manager told us we were part of a stream of people who worked in walnut creek that showed up on the wrong day to buy our monthly stock of food...And the local feed store reported the same strange event.  as dusty ole cowboys and there familes came to buy tack..Cloths..Boots..Shirts...Barb wire...Ect.

since then the ranch hands wives moved into town houses..Pernmantly bolting down windows...Placing dead bolts on doors...Even inside bathroom doors..Bedroom doors..Buying pistols..And bigger meaner dogs..(their children affraid..And them..After finding strange marks on the bottom of the kid's backs and by the belly button ..Including themselves..The men strange marks near their knee's.  some of the men's wife's refused ever too return much less spend the night in walnut creek...Ever agin.  

you should note: we had rash of cattle mutalations..About same time..Mainly pregnant cows..The calf laying there still in the birthin' sack..But, the mom cut to pieces.  their rear end just gone..Eye's..Tongue..Guts...Just gone.  and hardly any blood.

what was really strange we all seemed to just forget about it..Never discussing it..Until the flap over phoenix..Same kinda' craft..Appeared over prescott..Chino valley..Mayer..Heading northwest toward walnut creek.
since then they've been seen just about every year..Around the 21st. of july..Rain or shine. oh yeah- the digital camera's did not work -but -the old instamatic's picked up big blur...Shaped like triangle..!

that's about it..Perhaps you can explain how we lost that time.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo visited ranch headquarters

content.detailedDescription:
Witness called dispatch, report was written by dispatch as he was talking to witness. steve cox, mufon dispatch

note: witness now lives in florida, event is in new jersey.

witness worked air traffic control for 35 years in the area of nyc and newark.
witness came from a movie, looked at traffic pattern, saw 2 air planes coming in for approach, the saw this huge triangle just sitting in the sky.

witness was about 2 miles from object.

object was so large you could park 5 to 7 747 on top if it, size estimated to be 1/4 to 1/2 mile long.

object was 5 miles due west of nyc pointing towards nyc.

witness checked with surrounding towers and no one picked them up on radar, and no pilot reported seeing anything.

witness plotted area and it was the only safe area to sit in with all the traffic patterns.
content.summary: Huge tri-angle over newark

content.detailedDescription: While shooting chemtrail got this without initially seeing it in the shot 800 dollar cannon 10 megapixel...It's been zoomed in about 20% the reall shot is like two dots
content.summary: Cigar /saucer

content.detailedDescription:
Look i don't have a ton of time but my wife was out shooting chemtrails? later she looks at the pics and notices two white dots....She zoomed in on them and you can see the lights and the vague shape but i would bet the farm this is the same craft....It is her second encounter i saw one with her in san diego 6 years ago over the bay but it was a classic "belgium triangle see "toppersbazaar.Com under "ufo" for description of that event......Anyhow the picture i'm sending you is a little blown up maybe 20 % in the original it's just two dots she could not see when shooting the picture...This is it baby.....Zoom in ...Let me know how you like it....The whole point is it's exactly the same craft that's on coast to coasts web site front page today "cigar shape in nevada"

please write back
content.summary: Cigar /saucer

content.detailedDescription: i saw no vehicles on the street.After i got up.  it sounded like a lound buzzing sound.  but only for a couple of seconds, i think.  call it how yow want it, it felt like a weird encounter.  can anyone explain it?  i live on a busy street and usually suffer insommnia.  but this was different.  yet explain where 7eral hours went after that noise.  i write this thou it seems only an hour had passed.   not much of a report but what if it comes back?  i've went out twice into the snow in socks look  and don't really want to know if something there.
content.summary: Didn't see any oject, rather heard a buzzing sound.
